metadata.title: ORUS Gallery | Contemporary Art | Taiwan
metadata.description: ORUS Gallery represents international contemporary artists for Asian and global collectors. Origin + Us: where art meets identity.

mission.title: Bridging Cultures Through Art
mission.text: ORUS Gallery exists to connect exceptional contemporary artists with discerning collectors across Asia and beyond. We believe that art transcends borders, and that the most meaningful collections are built through trust, expertise, and shared passion.

team.title: France & Taiwan
team.paris: Our Paris team brings decades of experience from leading auction houses and galleries, maintaining strong connections with European contemporary artists.
team.taiwan: Our Taiwan team serves as the gateway to Asian collectors, offering local expertise and building lasting relationships across the region.

curatorial.title: Our Philosophy

value1.title: Continuity over Speed
value1.text: We build lasting relationships with artists and collectors, nurturing careers and collections over decades, not seasons.

value2.title: Depth over Breadth
value2.text: We represent fewer artists with deeper commitment, ensuring each voice receives the attention and care it deserves.

curatorial.quote: Art is not a transaction. It is a conversation that spans generations.

approach.title: Premium, Discrete Service
approach.text: We provide bespoke advisory services to collectors, offering private viewings, personalized recommendations, and discreet transactions. Your journey with art is personal, and we treat it as such.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.subtitle: Discover our artists or start a conversation

curatorial.title: Where Art Meets Identity
curatorial.text1: ORUS Gallery emerges from a profound conviction: art transcends borders, cultures, and time. Based in Taiwan with deep connections to Paris, we champion contemporary artists whose work explores memory, identity, and the human condition.
curatorial.text2: We believe in continuity over speed, depth over breadth. Each artist we represent carries a singular voice that resonates across cultures, creating bridges between the intimate and the universal.

pillar1.title: Exacting Curation
pillar1.text: Every artist in our roster is selected through rigorous evaluation. We represent only those whose vision and craft meet our exacting standards.

pillar2.title: Bespoke Collector Support
pillar2.text: Personal advisory services tailored to your journey. From first acquisition to building a comprehensive collection, we guide you at every step.

pillar3.title: International Network
pillar3.text: With presence in Taiwan and Paris, we connect Asian collectors with European artists and facilitate cross-cultural dialogue through art.

cta.title: Start a Conversation
cta.subtitle: We welcome inquiries from collectors and art enthusiasts. Our team responds within 24 hours.
